programme.title: Christmas in the Smokies
programme.desc: Clinging to the only life she's ever known, a headstrong woman (along with her loving parents) finds herself on the verge of losing her family's berry farm in the heart of the Smoky Mountains, to an impending retail expansion. Over one eventful holiday season, she tries every avenue possible to save the farm. But, when the local town leaders notify her that they will have to seize the property after the holidays, her last hope to unite the town, is to throw a Christmas concert on the farm, headlined by her former love, a ne'er-do-well country music superstar. As the day of the concert approaches, they all must learn the value of family, faith and community—before time runs out.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Handcrafted America - Sgrafitto Ceramics, Wood Tables and Steampunk Lamps: Host Jill Wagner travels the country on a quest to find talented craftsmen who still make incredible items by hand. First, in Lambertville, New Jersey, Jill visits the studio of ceramicist Katherine Hackl to learn the technique of sgraffito, the scratching of intricate patterns into the surface of pottery. Then, she's off to Kenosha, Wisconsin, where she meets Martin Antaramian, a young woodworker who is creating solid wood tables that look as if they are made of swirling fabric. Finally, she heads to Farmington, Minnesota, to see how lamp maker Shawn Carling turns castaway machine parts into hip, nostalgic lamps.

programme.title: State Plate
programme.desc: State Plate - Utah: Host Taylor Hicks gets a little salty when State Plate heads to Utah. First, he heads 5000 feet underground and jumps into the “worlds' biggest salt grinder” to mine the purest salt in the country. From there he starts his plate with a savory salt-crusted beef tenderloin. Next, Taylor goes for three side dishes that shout family and flavor. He discovers the many ways you can prepare Utah's official snack: Jell-O. Then he shares the secret behind the state's famous fry-sauce. And what in the world are funeral potatoes? Taylor finds a comforting casserole that's simply to die for. Finally, he feels the heat as he learns how to preserve Utah's celebrated cherry crop, and treats himself to tart cherry cookies that are simply divine.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Into The Wild Frontier - Joe Meek: Cunning Captive: A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: At 12 months, babies can identify specific sounds, and they re also starting to match the sounds they hear with the objects that make them. Meet the Orchestra -- First Instruments presents your little "maestro" with a playful introduction to the sights and sounds of a real orchestra -- from the clashing of cymbals to the purring of the cello and everything in between!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As their communication skills continue to develop, little ones begin to recognize common words and may point to objects or pictures when these items are named. Baby Wordsworth playfully taps into your little one's natural curiosity and introduces 30 words from around the home -- both spoken and in sign language. This engaging program presents little ones with familiar objects in the kitchen, playroom, yard and more -- from the living room window to their favorite teddy bear.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Baby's innate curiosity about all they see and hear increases on a daily basis. Before long, they begin to associate words with objects and to imitate and articulate sounds. Why not give their eyes and ears something wonderful to feast upon? Baby Shakespeare presents little ones with 12 common words that can be found within the rich context of classic poems and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Join our playful puppet host, Bard the Dragon, on a fun-filled adventure using everyday words such as flower, cat, and moon, and beautiful scenery from nature. World Of Words lets you and your little one share the excitement of discovering new words together!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies turn one year old, they continue to develop their communication skills. Meanwhile, with you as their guide, they also begin to explore the world beyond their front door. Baby's Favorite Places presents them with a playful introduction to 20 words for the names of familiar locations from the market, to the library, to the local park.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones become better acquainted with the world, they grow curious about animals of all kinds, beyond just the family pet. And as their communication skills continue to develop, they enjoy imitating animal sounds as well. Baby Noah Animal Expedition takes your little explorer across the globe to meet animals -- two-by-two -- from the savannah, the rainforest and tropics, the Outback, the ocean and the Polar Regions.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies grow and change, so does the landscape around them. From fiery red leaves to falling snowflakes from flowers in bloom to fireworks in July, every season of the year has its own special magic just waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Baby Mozart is an introduction to Mozart's beautiful music, which has been proven to have positive affects on people of all ages, especially babies. Images of brightly colored toys and known objects aid in the audio presentation of child-friendly arrangements and sound effects.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies grow, their eye-hand coordination begins to improve as their ability to interact with their surroundings blossoms. It is the perfect time for My First Signs, A playful introduction to 20 common words and phrases from baby's world -- including ''mommy'', ''daddy'' and ''I love you'' -- both Spoken and in Sign Language.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies continue to explore the world around them, they soon encounter many creatures, both large and small, that are extremely intriguing. Whether furry or feathered, winged or wiggly, bumpy or smooth, each holds a special fascination. Neighborhood Animals exposes little ones to animals most likely to be found close to home or in easily recognized environments.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Set off on a fun-filled "field trip" with your baby to discover animals found at the park, on the farm, and in your own backyard.

programme.desc: The Teletubbies want to go to sleep, but Tinky Winky finds Po already asleep in his bed. So he goes to look for somewhere else to sleep.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Every day with Barney is fun-but today is stuuu-PENDously special: it's Barney's birthday! His friends decide to throw a party and BJ and Baby Bop arrive with party supplies to help prepare for the festivities. Jackson is inspired by their assortment of handmade presents and hurries home in search of a very "special" gift for Barney. While waiting for his return, they play party games, sing songs and open presents.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney and the children spend the day preparing for a performance for their friends in the park. BJ has trouble deciding what talent he'll perform in the show, but when he's reminded to just be himself, he discovers a talent that rocks the park!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Happy, sad, or mad, Barney and his friends discover that feelings aren't bad. The children have fun making masks to show what they're feeling on the inside. While Baby Bop and BJ learn how to talk about their feelings after an argument. Everyone finds their feelings change while singing, dancing, exercising, and being with friends.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: A special project provides the perfect opportunity for Barney, Baby Bop and BJ to learn about love and relationships the "heart" way as they make a "Friends and Family Tree." Songs and games provide a fun way to remind them that playing together, being helpful and showing kindness are all ways of being nice to those we love and care about. With Barney's help, Baby Bop and BJ discover there are many people we love and care for and who care for us!

programme.title: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Imagine that! After Laura draws a special picture, Barney and his friends use their imaginations to bring her picture to life. A treasure trove of fun is shared on their stu-u-pendous island adventure.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Celebrate the things that make us special! Barney and his friends discover that trying something new can be fun. Jackson treats everyone to his healthy but unusual snack, while Baby Bop has a special picnic for BJ consisting mostly of her favorite foods.

programme.title: Barney and Friends

programme.desc: Bob is demolishing an old house. Farmer Pickles needs a fence built to keep the rabbits out.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a new exercise park. Farmer Pickles has decided to open a camp site on his land.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Mayor asks Bob to build a Pets Corner in a local park. / A burst pipe outside Mr Sabatini's needs fixing.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is making a through-lounge at the Bentleys'. / Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and team are building a barn for Farmer Pickles. / Farmer Pickles wants to open a camp site on his land.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob goes to Farmer Pickles farm to take some photographs. / Mrs Bentley asks Bob to build a new model railway.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and Wendy are converting a shop into a restaurant. / Bob is building a new swimming pool for the Mayor.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Beasley's pipes are making banging noises. Bob and the gang are building a pedestrian...

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob wants to impress everybody at the town dance. Molly suggests holding a fashion show.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Ellis has doves delivered to use in a magic act. / Bob and the gang are replacing pipes outside town hall.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang convert a house into two separate flats. / Farmer Pickles is having problems with mice.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Spud decides being a Scarecrow is hard work! / It's Christmas Eve and the machines are very excited.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob, Dizzy and Roley repair the pavement in the town centre. / Bob and Lofty make an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: While working in her store, Orange overhears the Berrykins laughing and shouting outside. When she goes to the door to investigate, a clump of dandelion fluff gets blown inside chased by three Berrykins. She watches as they head butt the clump around until it floats back toward Orange. Just as it floats close, she gives it a bat sending it outside and the Berrykins happily chasing after it. Wanting in on the fun, she joins them.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With all the Baby Berrykins running around Berry Bitty City, Princess Berrykin decides to build a Day Care Center and playground. But she's worried because it's dull-looking - all grey metal and brown wood. She asks Strawberry whom might be good to help her out. And two names immediately come to her mind - Lemon and Raspberry! The Princess confesses she's always admired their sense of design and style.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With only a few days of summer left, the girls are about to enjoy their first vacation in their newly-created, tropical beach resort at Berry Bitty Lake, when who should descend upon them but Mavis Maraschino, the comically over-the-top "Entertainment Tonight"-style show host. Mavis has dumped her focus on fashions in favor of an even glitzier show called Lifestyles of the Berry Big Bitty Stars, and she wants her first segment to be about how pop superstar Cherry Jam spends her vacation.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: On a beautiful winter's night, Blueberry reads the Baby Berrykins a story of what happened one winter in Berry Bitty City-a winter that almost wasn't. Just as everyone is ready for winter fun and fashions, a sudden warming melts the snow and ruins their plans. Improvising with snowmen made of shaved ice and cotton puffs, Strawberry and her friends play "Capture the Snowman's Carrot Nose." The Berrykins want to join in the fun, so the girls play against them, with Strawberry refereeing.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: It's another windy winter day, and the postal bees are staying indoors-the wind is too strong for their berry bitty wings. "We don't know when the next mail will get through!" It's bad news for Blueberry, who has been anxiously awaiting the next installment of a Patty Persimmon Detective story. If only she could get to the post office in Berry Bitty Dale where her package is waiting!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: It appears winter is finally coming to an end and Raspberry is planning a big fashion show to display her spring line. Her vision is to have the girls model her fashions in a parade past the town fountain. What she didn't realize is that the Berrykins are turning the fountain into a big water show. Every time the girls come to rehearse, they must comically dodge jets of fruit juice from the out-of-control fountain-the Berrykins are still working out the bugs.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry, Cherry and the girls form a new band, Strawberry and the Sweet Beats, and prepare to go on the road to perform at the Opening Ceremony of the Berry Big City Games! While master mechanic Berrykin Bruce turns Cherry's tour bus into the band's hotel-on-wheels, Strawberry and her friends pack for the big trip. But the rest of Berry Bitty City points out that someone needs to run the girls' businesses while they are gone.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berrykins Ed and Earl report to Princess Berrykin and Strawberry that they are certain there is a monster in the berry patch! They saw something with many noses and many tails making weird noises in the bushes. But upon further investigation by Strawberry and her friends, it is discovered that friendly boy Huckleberry Pie was driving his pet-mobile of orphan dogs through the countryside, took a wrong turn and got stuck near Berry Bitty City.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry is disappointed in the girls' lack of enthusiasm for the Patti Persimmon mystery novels, her favorite book series. She finds herself missing the company of her fellow Persimmon fan Huckleberry, and thinks up a great way to get him to visit. She invites Huck to co-write a story with her to submit to an online mystery magazine.. Huck eagerly accepts and comes for a visit.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Huckleberry and Blueberry's Patti Persimmon-style mystery story is rejected by an online mystery magazine, Blueberry and Huck have to come up with a new way to raise support for Huckleberry's Hotel for Homeless Pets back in Berry Big City. Strawberry suggests they hold a big dog show! Plum makes over-ambitious plans to display talents that her dog does not quite have, trying to teach him complicated dance routines.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The Baby Berrykins are enthralled by a fairytale that Blueberry reads to them for Story Time. Charmed by their reaction, Strawberry suggests that the girls do a "berrytale play" for the kids, sort of a "Story Time On Stage." Plum volunteers to direct it. She envisions a small, simple production-until she hears about a gigantic production of "Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins" that's a smash hit in Berry Big City.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a "Story Time On Stage" musical play for the Berrykin kids: "Berryella and Prince Berry Charming," directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, "The Littlest Berrykin," into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the "retrieve" part of the activity-as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search.

programme.title: Oddbods
programme.desc: Follow the wacky of adventures of the Oddbods in Oddsville!

programme.sub-title: Twinkle Spends Time with Friends This Winter
programme.desc: Join Twinkle and sing along to your favourite lullabies.

programme.desc: No matter what the town needs, Mila and her magical pet, Morphle will work together to save the day.

programme.desc: Follow the wacky of adventures of the Oddbods in Oddsville!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.sub-title: Sing Along Fun With Little Angel
programme.desc: Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.sub-title: A Fabulous Day with Little Angel
programme.desc: Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.title: KiiYii
programme.sub-title: KiiYii Knows How to Have Fun
programme.desc: Join Kii and Yii on their action-packed adventures round the magical playmat.

programme.title: KiiYii
programme.desc: Join Kii and Yii on their action-packed adventures round the magical playmat.

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Kid video superstar Ryan and his Ryan's World pals take you along on all their awesome learning adventures!

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Animals everywhere! Ryan meets cool kid-friendly pets, Gus the Gummy Gators wrangles zoo animals, and more.

programme.title: Jason Vlogs
programme.desc: Pull on your knee pads! Jason and Alex learn the importance of safety, plus even more fun lessons for kids.

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Kid video superstar Ryan and his Ryan's World pals take you along on all their awesome learning adventures!

programme.title: KidCity
programme.desc: Play along with the KidCity family —Little Flash, Ava, DadCity, and MomCity— in all their kid-friendly games!

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Pranks and challenges galore! Join Ryan and his family for fun and games in Ryan's World.

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship ‘The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become ‘The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the “Minitrex” – a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for “Best Costume.” The prize: “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1.” The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just…about…to get the book when…the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1” is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy…she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show – in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day – Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty – the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.title: The King's Tournament
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights – the Tighty Knighties – are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks “How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero.” But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament – she's agreed to be in “princess mode” for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls – until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong – especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing (“Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?”), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then…more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort “Exalted Towers” renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the “high class” resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are “off” at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see…Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters – though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of “snotty” monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham – one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a “snotheiser” ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters … some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath…he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two…it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power “Glorious Griffon” but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her – till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit…

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A homecoming is interrupted for Sonic, Sonia and Manic when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes after returning to their birthplace.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia discovers that the watch she received from her friend is actually a monitoring device for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The sinister Robotnik blackmails Cyrus, an old friend of Sonic's, by holding his father hostage.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Rumor has it that Queen Aleena's journals are buried in the city of Tashistan. Sonic and his siblings search the city for the scrolls.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: During a mission to one of Robotnik's factories, Sally is taken prisoner by Robotnik and Snively, who construct a roboti-sized "Sally" clone, complete with Sally's personality, and mannerisms. The double tricks Sonic into rescuing "Sally".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboti-sizer system. While underground, Sonic spots his now roboti-sized Uncle Chuck aboard a Badlands bound mine-train and devises a plan for his rescue.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sally, Rotor, Bunnie and Antoine take off in a homemade airplane, bound for an ancient city hidden deep in the Great Mountains, while Sonic follows via his favorite transportation, his sneakers.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: While on a mission to the big city to replace Nicole's malfunctioning microchip, Sonic and Sally encounter the Guardian, a mysterious cloaked figure who guards a dormant wizard named Lazar and his computer of evil spells.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic is hired into an obvious trap when a frustrated Robotnik decides to appeal to the Hedgehog's ego and announces a "race to determine the fastest on Mobius".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands. Upon Sonic's return, the Freedom Fighters honor him with a victory party.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik launches a spy-orb that will uncover the Freedom Fighter's Knothole location, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy-sphere aboard a home-made rocket powered by Robotnik's discarded booster engine.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Sally uncovers Robotnik's plan to seed the cloud with toxic rain, they attempt a daring mission to sabotage the dirigible-like craft being transported by land vehicles. Mission fails when Sally, Bunnie and Antoine are captured.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The four members of the Shane Gang think they've found the fifth in Twist, a street-smart kid who volunteers his help when the gang needs it most on a mission gone wrong. But Twist harbors a dark secret that could doom the mission - and the Shane Gang.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Avalanched inside a frozen cavern, the Shane Gang can't figure out which is worse: being trapped with a vicious Ice Ogre that only gets bigger the more you shoot it?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A thief breaks into the Shane Gang HQ looking for the fabled "Shane Treasure" - a portion of which she believes belongs to her. The thief escapes with nothing, but Eli does manage to find a treasure chest. To unlock it, the thief and the gang will need to travel to a remote, dangerous cavern to find a special slug. The journey is fraught with peril, and when they finally open the box, what's inside is not at all what they were expecting...

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Notorious con man Gar Rivelle has many convinced he has discovered the way to a secret land... a land that seems to be the surface! Eli uncovers the truth - Gar is getting his information from a coded Shane diary. Keeping the surface secret is Eli's number one mission, so he steals the diary from Gar, sparking an all-out siege on the Shane HQ. Eli realizes that for him to continue in Slugterra, he's going to have to confide his greatest secret to his friends.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli fires slugs right and left during a fast-paced slugout on mecha-back! "See you back home," Eli tells the slugs he has to leave behind as he races across a cavern during the fight. The battle won, the Shane Gang is on its way back home when Eli runs into a situation that he can't ignore. One thing leads to another and Eli ends up challenged to a duel. Only one problem, Eli's doesn't have Burpy or the rest of his best slugs! They're still on the way back home!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Driven by his intense slug phobia, scientist Quentin Kozinski has invented mechanical slugs. Armed with this fearsome arsenal, he sets out to prove that science can beat any slug and any slinger including the Shane Gang! But Eli is determined to prove that no thinking, living thing can ever be bested by a machine.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A mysterious slugslinging master appears for the first time in 20 years. Though old, this slinger is an amazing battler incredibly fast and the master of an unstoppable slinging technique. Eli, Kord, Trixie and Pronto all want to study with the master and learn this awesome move. But so does Dr. Blakk's protégé Twist! Now Eli must face off against Twist and prevent the master from choosing a villain for a student.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Blakk has hired Brutale - a thug as brutal as his name - to build a Deep Water Rig to drill for Dark Water at the bottom of the Cavern Sea. Needing some water-breathing labor for the job, Brutale steals Marvolio Drake's reptilian pirate crew. Desperate to get his men back, Drake forms an unlikely alliance with the Shane Gang, who are just as desperate to shut the Dark Water rig down.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Using some stolen Shadow Clan tech, Dana Por is able slip in and out of any cavern in Slugterra - and rob them blind! But when she makes the mistake of stealing from Dr. Blakk, Eli is the only one who can protect her from The Gentleman, a suave but deadly mercenary Blakk hires to take back what was stolen from him - and bring back the scalp of the girl who stole it!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Lumino cavern is under attack! A swarm of Neurotox ghoul slugs have created a massive toxic cloud that's attacking the residents. The Shane Gang must brave an inescapable maze called the Cavern of Time to locate Blite, the only man who knows enough about regular Neotox slugs to help them stop the cloud created by the ghouls. Just a few problems with that plan: Blite is a deadly maniac, whose reign of terror ended only after Will Shane trapped him in the Cavern of Time.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli and Kord have been trying to create a fusion shot: two slugs shot at exactly the same time that can merge their powers! But they'll need to mod Eli's blaster to handle it. In search of the one missing part that will complete Eli's Double Barreled Blaster, the gang journey to the Scrap Heap, a junk yard cavern of epic proportions. Finding the part isn't easy. Getting out with it alive past Boss Ember and his Scrap Force is nearly impossible.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When Eli and the Shane Gang find themselves trapped in the Deep Caverns underneath Slugterra they discover a whole new type of danger threatening to escape. Allowing it past the barrier would mean unprecedented peril - not only for Slugterra, but our world above too!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Armed with his powerful new weapon the Gatling Blaster, Blakk's unstoppable battle train threatens to run roughshod over all of Slugterra - unless Eli can master his new Double Barrel Blaster and come up with a powerful fusion move in time to stop it.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang find themselves competing in the Slugball Championship - a rough and tumble cross between hockey, slugslinging and rugby - with deadly random obstacles thrown in for fun! Eli suspects the rival team is cheating, but he's going to have to prove it first... that is if he can survive the game!

programme.title: Foods for The Brain
programme.desc: Lily knows the smartest way to start the day is with a good breakfast, and meets Chef Donna Dooher to make Green Eggs and Ham. Avery visits a centre that researches fish. Matt keeps score as the two face-off with blueberry and strawberry deserts that help build brain power.

programme.title: On with the show, Percival Learns to Dance, Hide & Seek
programme.desc: EP22: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, welcomed by the princess and the Knight.EP23: oom! Boom! Boom! The ground shakes a little in the World of Enchantment : it's Percival the dragon who tries to learn how to dance with a balloonEP24: The princess is playing hide-and-seek and asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to help her find the Fearless Knight, and Percival the dragon.

programme.title: Percival makes a Present, A Surprise for Percival, A Day at The Circus
programme.desc: EP25: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, they find Percival who has an idea for his mum's birthday: he wants to offer her a pearl necklace.EP26: Tijinou and Tijibelle meet the Fearless Knight. He brings a huge basket to the princess, because she is organising a surprise for Percival, the dragon.EP27: The puppy Hot Dog, Percival the dragon and Super Hero are plotting something with Rigolini the clown when Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland.

programme.title: It's A Crazy, Crazy World
programme.desc: The Winx decide to go back to Alfea with their Fairy Animals: in order to catch them, Kalshara has to find a way to enter the school for fairies. But, suddenly, the Winx are called by Roxy for an emergency: the weather in Ethiopia has gone crazy, threatening the cranes that migrated over there. Together with the Pixies, the six fairies get to Ethiopia, but then they have to use their Tynix power to enter the Sundial MiniWorld and sort things out. Before going back home, the Winx find a little Digmole that says it's searching for its own fairy, Faragonda!

programme.title: The Kingdom Of Diamonds -Winx Club
programme.desc: The Digmole the Winx show to Faragonda says it's bonded with the Alfea headmistress, but Faragonda has vague memories about it. Bloom explains that this could be due to the fact that the previous headmistress, Mavilla, cancelled all the memories of the Alfea fairies about the Fairy Animals. As they are speaking, Bloom has an intuition: she realizes that the animal with the First Colour of the Universe is the small statue representing a Digmole taken by Faragonda in the past as it is made of diamond, it reflects all the colours of light. The Winx shrink to enter the Adamantine MiniWorld and there they find a diamond that has the Ultimate Power, but a sudden collapse of the orchard-greenhouse buries Flora under a pile of rocks…

programme.title: Blippi Visits Kennedy Space Center
programme.desc: Blippi visits the Kennedy Space Center and learns about space!

programme.title: The Berry Bitty Great Race
programme.desc: Apple isn't paying attention when Strawberry describes their campout tradition of telling "Tall Tales." So Apple tells her thrilling adventure of a wild road rally she entered, only to surprise the girls by proving the story is actually true.

programme.title: The Berry Best Taste Test
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball. A madcap chase ensues as Apple tries to stop the airmail postal bees from delivering the cake.

programme.title: Foods that Smell
programme.desc: Lily and Avery follow their noses to find out what gives foods their amazing aromas. Avery enjoys a super garlicky Caesar salad, and then tries to sniff out a cure for his ghastly garlic breath. Lily makes a splash at the fish market where she gets to the bottom of seafood's suspicious smells. Together, they take on the ultimate olfactory challenge: recreating Matt's Amazing Seafood Chowder, by sense of smell alone!

programme.title: Foods that Melt
programme.desc: Watch foods melt before your eyes! Chill out as Lily tries to solve the mystery behind Baked Alaska, a frozen dessert that doesn't melt in the oven. Onthe hunt for a simple snack, Avery visits a local cheese shop and discovers there's moreto cheese than just cheddar! Back at the kitchen with Matt, Lily and Avery use a varietyof cheeses and fresh veggiesto see who can make thebest twist on an ooey-gooey melted favourite: grilled cheese sandwiches!

programme.title: Painting By Magic, The Princess's Ball, A trick for Thunder Girl
programme.desc: EP28: Today the princess decides to repaint everything with magic paint! A little stroke of the paint brush and everything will take on the colour of the rainbow… EP29: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, they find Violette the Farmer, saddened. EP30: With the help of a magic wand and a magic hat, Rigolini plays magicians in Wonderland.

programme.title: Anoki's Igloo, Fish, Lemons and Gherkins, An Exciting Fishing Trip

Our friends have brought a basket full of food: honey for Bianca the little Bear, yellow for Anoki, and chicory and pickles for Dylan l'Élan, who just loves that! Mmm… EP33: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on the ice, they hear laughter and joyous yelping!… It's Hot Dog the puppy playing with Bianca the little Bear around a picnic basket. But Anoki asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to deal with it because he promised Thunder Fairy to teach him to fish on the ice.

programme.title: Skull of the Black Raven

Through "Buddyfight", humans have started cultural interactions with residents from other worlds called "Affinity Dimensions". Buddyfight is a game with selected humans as the "Buddyfighter", and residents from the other world as the partner (known as "Buddy Monster"). These battles have high significance and sometimes it is even used to decide the fate of a nation, and naturally there are those who seek to use the Buddy Monsters for evil purposes.

programme.title: I'll Get You! Holiday
programme.desc: The action takes place in all year round resort, where Wolf doesn't chase Hare to eat him anymore: now it's all about sports and competition. However, in his crazy chase after recognition and victories the grey hooligan often uses methods that aren't really fair, which provokes awkward and funny situations.

programme.title: Bat Pat
programme.desc: The series follows the comedy adventures of Bat Pat and the Silver brothers Martin, Leo and Rebecca as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home in Fogville, a small town that seems to be the center of all things weird in the world, a veritable magnet to ghosts, mummies, witches, creatures, werewolves and things that go bump in the night. Bat Pat will prove that the supernatural isn't always evil but just misunderstood. Our heroes will come to understand something important: the supernatural “bad guys” are not really bad, but normal people whose actions are misunderstood by the more inhabitants of Fogville and what they really want is... just help!

programme.title: Pumpkin Reports
programme.desc: Max Green's new brother and sister are aliens sent to Earth as the advance party for an invasion - and he's the only one who can stop them turning humans into unwilling slave-gardeners.

programme.title: TOBOT
programme.desc: Ryan and Kory are twin brothers with one big secret: They're Tobot pilots.

programme.title: Roger
programme.desc: The lively adventures of a little girl, the carefree, joyful and occasionally perky Fatou, and an alien, the clumsy Roger, on a tropical island… Throughout their adventures, they trigger small accidents that sometimes grow into major disasters, but (almost) always end on a happy note. In short, Roger and Fatou spend their time saving the island from their own mistakes and blunders.

programme.title: VIP Pets
programme.desc: We are the VIP Pets! The coolest pets with a passion for hair! We are best friends and together we will discover lots of beautiful hairstyles and go on exciting adventures!

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep

programme.title: Fishtronaut

programme.title: Horaci the Inuit

programme.title: Pim & Pom at the Museum

Pim and Pom, two little cats, take the children on an adventure in the fascinating world of art. Featured artists include Seurat, Renoir and Malevitsch, Rembrandt, Vermeer and Van Gogh. Through the power of their imagination, they explore paintings by famous artists like Vincent van Gogh, Johannes Vermeer, Rembrandt, Seurat and Renoir. The paintings form the backdrop for all their adventures as these curious little cats (literally) dive into a different artwork in each episode. The animation series will be a first introduction to the visual arts for young children.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Thunderbell, Ellie, and Kiki are looking hard for something. It turns out that when Thunderbell was trying on Kiki's crown, he accidentally dropped it and a gem went missing. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Rainbow Village friends are on a train and they are concerned that the train won't stop. The engine is even smoking! programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to turn into a clean-up engineer and starts cleaning with her friends.

Ruby and Choco get their suitcase and as Ruby swings her umbrella, there they are, in front of Rainbow fountain. Mayor Ling Ling tells her that today is the day of Princess Kiki's ballet performance.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby is looking at shoes that are now too small for her but she is unwilling to throw away. Ling Ling is worried about Thunderbell. It took a long time for the village friends to prepare an amazing painting for the mayor. Unfortunately, Thunderbell accidentally destroyed the painting while delivering it.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.desc: When Miss Dottie goes missing, Rev and Avery offer to return her to the Rancher's Jamboree! Rumble is star-struck by the show-sheep, until the unlikely duo become friends. Now they'll need all the help they can get to stop the wayward ball from wrecking all of Fender Bend!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev's dad tells about him about treasure sunken in the pond, Rev and Avery set out on a pirate adventure! They outfit Rumble and Alley with new dive equipment to salvage the long-lost toys and cherished memories found within the chest. // When Rev's cousin Katie comes to visit, Avery's jealousy gets the best of her-Avery always thought she was the coolest girl Rev knew! Intent on outdoing Katie, Avery pulls a stunt that she comes to regret.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: As Rev and Avery compete to see who can be the best helper, they accidentally work against each other and end up making things more complicated for those they // Rev thinks Avery is moving away! Upset, he leads an all-out effort to convince her to stay, showing her that Fender Bend is the best place to live-despite Avery's protests that she's too busy. Finally, Avery confronts their strange behaviour.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After a snowstorm, Rev and Avery compete for title of Champion of the Winter Bestival! Avery is determined to hold her title from last year. Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When damage from a storm threatens to cancel the Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park Skills Contest, Owen is disappointed he won't get to compete. Rev leads the kids in the Stunt Park clean-up, and soon discovers that this is really an opportunity in disguise! // Rev and the gang make their own castle and play as knights of old. But when their sticks and building supplies begin to disappear, Bo leads them into a medieval battle of wits with the culprit-a cranky beaver!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rumble cracks his mirror, he thinks it gave him bad luck, and his confidence takes a hit. Even after Rev fixes the mirror and bolsters his pal, the bad luck continues. But when danger strikes, can Rumble regain his self-esteem and save the day? // When Rev hears about a vehicle long jump contest, he dreams of fame and victory. But even with a grueling training plan from coaches Avery and Alley, the record-breaking jump seems out of reach...until Alley ends up in danger and needs their help!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy, Rumble gets jealous of all the attention he gets. And much to his annoyance, while Rev and Avery try everything to teach the pup new tricks (with no success), it only has eyes for Rumble! // When Rev tries to teach Rumble to swim with his special inflated tires, Rumble keeps sinking to the bottom of the pond. Ben and Molly suggest they get advice from Gilly, the old Fender Bend ferry pilot.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When a game of Bumper Ball gets a little too heated, the friends start competing against their own teammates! But when a stray ball knocks open the sheep pen, they'll have to learn to work together to round up the sheep...and get back to the game! // Rev and his friends receive a map in pieces, so they race up separate mountain trails, vying to be first to claim the treasure at the top. But when there's no treasure in sight at the end, Rev's parents have some advice for finding the real reward.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery set out to conquer a legendary endurance course, the course's challenges put their truck power to the test. But as they near the end, a call for help takes them off course-and straight into a rescue mission to save their heroes! // When Rev sees Lori working the quarry in secret, Lori asks Rev to keep it secret-she worries she isn't good enough, and dreams of working with the big quarry trucks one day. But when quarry workers need help, Rev has to convince Lori to save the day!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev can't wait to take Avery camping. But when he learns they're trying a new campsite for the first time ever, he is disappointed-what if the new campsite isn't as fun...or worse...boring?! It's up to Avery to get him excited for a new adventure! // Rev wants to be just like his dad, so he and Rumble attempt Ben and Duke's usual tasks. They're disappointed when they aren't strong enough to tackle the big jobs the way Ben would, but sometimes, a little Rev magic and Rumble power are even better!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev and Avery find a stray kitten, they put posters around to alert its owner. The owner arrives at the Gear Up Garage...just as the kitty vanishes! Rev and the gang set out to find the kitten, and Operation Kitten Care becomes Operation Rescue! // When Rev leads the gang in a fossil hunting expedition, they find an enormous skull! But when Molly breaks the news that they'll have to leave the skeleton for professionals to dig up, Rev wonders how he can still have a dinosaur of his own.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Tony Deyo is a stand-up comedian known most notably for his sharp, quick material and near-perfect comedic timing almost certainly gained from his years as a professional symphony musician. New York City's Village Voice calls him “one of the tightest joke writers in the business.” In 2013, he made his late night television debut on CONAN. Within a year, he had added appearances on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, AXS TV's Gotham Comedy Live, and Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen. His latest album, Comedy Road Trip, landed on the Billboard Magazine comedy chart and debuted as the #1 selling stand-up album on iTunes. With over 50 stand-up clips available, he has steadily become one of the most prolific comedians on YouTube. He performed at the prestigious HBO Aspen Comedy Festival, was named one of the year's best by the New York Post, and can be heard regularly on SiriusXM Satellite Radio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Jason Hewlett: I'm the Weird One
programme.desc: The Award-Winning One-Man Show of Jason Hewlett The Entertainer will have you laughing until it hurts. Comedy, Music, Impressions, and Standing Ovations make Jason the perfect entertainer.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I'm wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central's “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC's “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Snowman's Pass
programme.desc: Still struggling to accept her fiancé's death in a rock climbing accident, mountain guide DIANA PENNINGTON gratefully accepts industrialist CURT SEAVER's offer to find the body using a new satellite imagery technology his company has developed. But while traversing the legendary "Snowman's Pass" with Curt and his companions HUGO and TYLER, Diana is horrified to discover the search for her fiancé is a decoy they are in fact hunting for a fallen spy satellite, property of an enemy foreign power.
