programme.desc: A woman travels from Los Angeles to Seattle to try to prevent her sister from going to prison for murder.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Earth to Echo
programme.desc: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

programme.title: Greatest Show On Earth
programme.desc: Charlton Heston stars as Brad Braden, the circus manager who lives and breathes to keep the show rolling. With the Big Top about to hit rock bottom, Braden hires The Great Sebastian, a daring trapeze legend, to revitalize the circus.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: I Walk Alone
programme.desc: After taking the rap for his partner, a mobster is released from prison to find his former partner entranched in a swank night club with no intention of sharing the riches.

programme.title: Houdini
programme.desc: Tony Curtis gives a winning performance as the great Houdini, the struggling circus performer who emerged as the world's most captivating magician and escape artist.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: American Yakuza
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen ("Green Book") stars as an undercover FBI agent who has risen through the ranks of the Yakuza and now finds himself caught in a war between the Yakuza, the mob and the FBI.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Edison
programme.desc: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a journalist (Justin Timberlake) joins forces with his editor (Morgan Freeman) and a renowned private detective (Kevin Spacey) to bring the force down.

programme.title: Ecstasy Of Order: The Tetris Master
programme.desc: Follows a group of record-holding Tetris players as they prepare to compete in the 2010 Classic Tetris World Championship.

programme.title: Red Heaven
programme.desc: In preparation for the first human mission to Mars, six volunteers take part in the ultimate dress rehearsal, living inside a year-long NASA simulation

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: From executive producer Denis Leary, BURN is an action-packed documentary about Detroit told through the eyes of firefighters charged with the task of saving a city that many have written off.

programme.title: Chop & Steele
programme.desc: Lifelong friends Joe Pickett and Nick Prueher, two comedians famous for pranking local news stations on live television as the fake strongman duo 'Chop & Steele,' find themselves in federal court with a vengeful media conglomerate after their latest morning show stunt goes viral.

programme.title: The YouTube Effect
programme.desc: Director Alex Winter explores the ascension and acceleration of YouTube, a video-sharing website that started with humble origins and has gone on to change how we experience the world. With exclusive access to some of YouTube's biggest stars, the film presents an eye-opening and troubling look at the platform now so powerfully embedded in our lives.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Coming home for the holidays is something most families cherish. After this holiday, Christmas will never be the same in the Higher-Mills family. Coming from mixed backgrounds, adopted siblings Smythe, Hanna, Bea, Shane, and Lonny along with their parents, Pat and Samantha, try to navigate their changing family and reunite during the holiday season.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Lancaster: Host Crystal Powell travels Dallas and tours historic Lancaster, Texas. Crystal takes you on a soulful and wholesome journey to family-owned and operated Casserole Soul Café. Followed by a snip from Crystal's stand-up special at SXSW!

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get hyped and head over with us to The Coaches Box in Duncanville, Texas, a Dallas suburb known for it's local sports legacy. Owner and operator Reginald Heath takes you on a journey to goal-winning and high-scoring delicious home-cooked fresh food alongside comedian D. Elli$.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Crystal is joined by local comedian Bryson Brown in Austin, Texas where they head down to the historic and celebrated Victory Grill. A local staple that hosted the likes of Billie Holiday and James Brown. Crystal partakes in local history and delicious shrimp and grits for this modern spin on brunch. Then, Crystal and Bryson bring the laughs with a special performance in Austin.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Feelin Okay? You will when Crystal take you through her sit down at Mr. A Ok's in San Antonio, Texas. We sit down with owner Cindy Kirk, whose father Mr. Alvis Kirk (Mr. A-OK) was the inspiration behind the restaurant. Cindy and her husband, chef Steven Harris, bring soul food and southern comfort including Fried Ribs, Chicken Fried Steak, and Oxtail to the San Antonio community. Then we're joined by local comedian Leah Sampson for laughs and a sit-down lunch!

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get ready for some island vibes, as Crystal takes you down to Houston where we're introduced to Just Oxtails in Missouri City, Texas. Locally owned and operated, Just Oxtails has been a local staple for the last twenty years where they've built a brand on “Just Oxtails!” Then we're joined by comedienne Lotto Marie who brings the laughs about her mid-west upbringing.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Continuing our tour of Missouri City in Houston, Texas, Crystal takes us to Micheaux's a local restaurant that made a name for themselves during the pandemic by giving back to the community through their “Everybody Eats” program. Owner Mr. Mischeaux serves up traditional southern Louisiana family recipes that include their signature Salmon, Five Cheese Macaroni & Cheese, and Peach Cobbler. Then, Crystal is joined by local comic Lady Rico for joyful tasting, followed by a return to the Bodega with a special set from Lady Rico.

programme.title: Thanksgiving With The Carters
programme.desc: A family tries to find common ground with its newest members, as they honor their tradition of Thanksgiving surprise, where each person attempts to surprise the family with something unique and positive.

programme.title: A Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Well-established blues singer, Miracle, has everything anyone could ask for, but fails to appreciate it. When an accident forces her to confront her past, she must face the music. It will take A Christmas Miracle for her to count her blessings.

programme.title: Falling for Christmas
programme.desc: When champion figure skater Claire becomes injured she is sent to a rehabilitation center in the snowy mountains where she meets and falls for a local ice fisherman who shows her there is more to life than competition.

programme.title: The Merry In-laws
programme.desc: After Alex gets engaged to Peter, she goes to meet his parents for the first time, not knowing they are actually Santa and Mrs. Claus.

programme.title: Christmas in The Heartland
programme.desc: Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young woman who comes from a life of privilege falls for the owner of a soup kitchen after discovering a Dear Santa letter written by his seven year old daughter.

programme.title: Christmas on Holly Lane
programme.desc: Life-long best friends Sarah, Cat and Riley reunite in Sarah's childhood home to cook up some Christmas magic and save the holidays for their families. With each friend at a different crossroad, they will all have to come together to rediscover the Christmas magic that can only happen in the house on Holly Lane.

programme.title: Duffy
programme.desc: Duffy is a cunning aristocrat of criminals who is hired by Stefane, a young playboy, to hijack a boat carrying several million dollars of his father's fortune. The plot succeeds, with a little help from Segolene, Stefane's girlfriend - but also with an unexpected, sudden turn of events.

programme.title: Who's Minding The Mint?
programme.desc: A clerk who works in the mint in Washington, DC accidentally destroys $50,000 in cash, and attempts to sneak into the building in the middle of the night and run off enough cash on the presses to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A U.S. Army tank crew joins a band of stragglers in a desperate search for water in the war-torn North African desert.

programme.title: Let's Do It Again
programme.desc: A couple faces divorce after a wife's plan to teach her unfaithful husband a lesson backfires.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: In a world where winning means survival, they broke the only rule... they fell in love.

programme.title: Eat A Bowl Of Tea
programme.desc: A Chinese-American and his wife face a clash of cultures in post-WWII New York's Chinatown.

programme.title: Fresh Horses
programme.desc: A safely conservative college senior meets a country girl who changes the course of his life.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a cowboy evades the law as he hunts for the real killer.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: An ex-soldier's plans to move east are delayed after his brother is murdered on the orders of a land baron.

programme.title: Beyond the Sacramento
programme.desc: Gunfire and lawlessness rule the land in California until "Wild Bill Hickok" (Bill Elliott) comes along to clean it up. Fast action and plenty of fighting in this western which has Elliott saving a frontier town from Bradley Page and Frank LaRue.

programme.title: Desert Vigilante
programme.desc: Charles Starrett stars as a federal agent assigned to stop the illegal flow of silver from Mexico into the U.S. The lawman soon figures out that the local U.S. attorney, Tristram Coffin, is in cahoots with the smugglers. After a few chases and shootouts, Starrett fulfills his mission.

programme.title: Fort Ti
programme.desc: A band of famed Indian fighters join British forces for an assault on the French at Fort Ticonderoga.

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas unmasks a killer posing as a door-to-door seed salesman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance run into trouble while transporting a captured killer back to face trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deathbed request from an old friend sends Lucas to a neighboring town in search of the man's long-lost sweetheart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a man, eerily similar to a man he killed, challenges him to a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas is in Wyoming on the trail of a gang illegally selling weapons to the Indians, Mark stays with Miss Milly, where he suffers from loneliness and doubt with his father gone for 2 months.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for answers when recovering alcoholic Micah Torrence returns to the bottle and turns in his badge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, Mark and Micah tangle with the Newman family and learn the secret of a town's 20-year-old mystery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Blinded in an explosion, Lucas fights despair as he prepares for a meeting with a gun-toting enemy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman can't talk his way out of an assault charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is threatened with hanging by a lynch party when some horses he has purchased in a neighboring town turn out to be stolen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A janitor-turned-gunfighter's reputation hangs on one lucky shot and a lot of gall. The handyman finds himself in trouble when he accidentally kills another gunfighter.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: During the Korean War, Second Lieutenant Sang-Yeol encounters a group of orphans while leading his platoon. Empathizing with their pain, he makes a choir with the children to protect them.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing VIP
programme.desc: Top National Security agent and zoophobe Tae-ju suddenly receives an ability to talk to the animals after a freak accident.

programme.title: The Recon
programme.desc: One day at early dawn, a search unit near the DMZ, the front line, is on alert. It was because a soldier from another unit's GP ran away to DMZ with a gun. Under Commander Baek, the 3rd platoon members led by First Lieutenant Cho are put into the operation to arrest the deserter. The search begins, and at the same time, First Lieutenant Lim's dead body is found at the unit's official residence. The accident is reported to the Division Headquarters and Captain Kang, who is about to be discharged, arrives at the search unit with an army surgeon. The commander and the army surgeon are rushing to conclude Lim's case with suicide, but Kang suspects that there is a deep secret in this accident. At that time, the soldiers who were put into the operations get killed one by one, and the dark truth between Lim's death and the deserter search operation is revealed.

programme.title: Katy Perry
programme.desc: The Prismatic World Tour is a sensory explosion of eye-popping theatrics, daring acrobatics and of course, all the hits. This concert film is a visually stunning production that captures Katy's fun-loving personality and artistic vision. Spanning the entire length of the arena floor, the innovative Prismatic tour stage allows Katy to share intimate moments with her fans in a unique shared connection with the music. Directed for the stage in seven thematic acts, this unmissable spectacle features hit after hit after hit. The World Tour captures the excitement, color and energy of the live Katy Perry extravaganza.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 70

programme.title: Rebelde

programme.title: Rebelde

programme.title: Rebelde

programme.desc: Don Agustín les aconseja a Jimena y Sarita que huyan para no casarse con hombres que no aman. Sofía le dice a Juan que tiene miedo de perder su amor porque no puede acercarse a él.

programme.title: Corazón Salvaje Capítulo 131
programme.desc: Juan y Renato se enfrentan en un duelo a muerte. Juan trata de salvar a Renato de caer por el acantilado, pero ambos caen desapareciendo en el mar. Noel y todo el puerto inician la búsqueda de Juan y Renato.

programme.title: Natacha
programme.desc: Natacha, una dulce e inocente muchacha provinciana, se muda a la ciudad para trabajar como sirvienta en la casa de una familia adinerada. Pero se enamora del hijo mayor de la familia y debe luchar contra los celos y envidias que ese amor provoca.

programme.title: La inocente
programme.desc: La inocencia de una mujer por un déficit, se convertirá en la peor pesadilla para sus seres queridos, después de que la cruda realidad del mundo exterior no la respetó y la convirtió en su víctima.

programme.title: Mamá, soy Paquito
programme.desc: Paquito vive con su madre en la pobreza y por ello canta para ganar dinero y poder darle una buena vida. La madre de Paquito muere y ahora él busca el amor de su padre, el cual es un hombre muy rico y a la vez despreciable.

programme.title: El día de las madres
programme.desc: Tres madres sufren al ver a sus hijos crecer, enfrentarse a los retos de la vida, enamorarse, cumplir sus sueños y luchar por salir adelante. A pesar de las adversidades, los muchachos celebran el 10 de mayo con la mujer más importante de sus vidas.

programme.title: Doña Bárbara
programme.desc: Doña Bárbara es una terrateniente que utiliza a los hombres para conseguir todas sus tierras y riquezas, tiene una hija, Marisela, que se convierte en su rival de amor, pues las dos están enamoradas del mismo hombre.

programme.title: Enamorada
programme.desc: El general Reyes se enamora de la bella y rica Beatriz Peñafiel. Beatriz no controla bien sus sentimientos y después de un paso a la curiosidad finalmente acepta el profundo y auténtico amor que siente hacía él.

programme.title: María Candelaria
programme.desc: María Candelaria y Lorenzo Rafael quieren casarse pero no tienen dinero. María Candelaria enferma y Lorenzo Rafael roba medicina para curarla. Él va a la cárcel y ella muere apedreada por los lugareños, quienes piensan que posó desnuda para un pintor.

programme.title: Salón México
programme.desc: Mercedes trabaja como bailarina en un cabaret para poder pagar la exclusiva escuela para señoritas a la que asiste su hermana Beatriz. Pero cuando Paco, su explotador, le roba una gran cantidad de dinero, Mercedes decide no aguantar ni un maltrato más.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A quien le dices tu secreto haces tu dueño'
programme.desc: Dos amigas se confiesan sus secretos y juran no decir nada. Un chico planea sacar provecho y afectar a una de ellas revelando un secreto que pondrá en evidencia su relación con el entrenador de natación.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Pocos ven lo que somos, pero todos ven lo que aparentamos'
programme.desc: Una joven es criticada y discriminada por su forma de vestir y comportarse, al grado de que sus compañeros inventan un rumor sobre su sexualidad. La situación comienza a salirse de control y la joven corre el riesgo de ser expulsada.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A quien cuece y amasa, no le quites la hogaza'
programme.desc: Una joven sueña con su fiesta de quince años, pero debido a que su papá decide vender la casa donde vive, su madre tiene que tomar el dinero de la fiesta. La joven se obsesiona con su fiesta y comienza a tratar mal a todos a su alrededor.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: Aún no ensillamos y ya cabalgamos
programme.desc: Un adolescente siente que ir a la escuela es una pérdida de tiempo y quiere trabajar para ganar dinero. Su tío le da una oportunidad de trabajar, pero el joven comienza a volverse irresponsable y su madre tendrá que hacerle ver la realidad.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'No supe de duelos hasta que junte mis hijos con los tuyos'
programme.desc: Dos chicas terminan su amistad debido a una fuerte pelea, las cosas se complican cuando sus padres se enamoran y tienen que vivir todos juntos en la misma casa.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'Quien de tu mal no te advierte, mal te quiere'
programme.desc: Un joven sueña con ser DJ, pero debe lidiar con la extrema disciplina de su abuelo, quien quedó a cargo de él después de la muerte de sus padres. El joven y su abuelo tendrán que aprender a convivir respetando sus diferencias.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A amor mal correspondido, ausencia y olvido'
programme.desc: Una joven tiene una relación con un hombre casado a pesar de que su padre y su amiga se oponen. Poco a poco la joven se va dando cuenta de las falsas promesas de su amante y comienza a aprender que no debe depender de nadie.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'La salud no tiene precio y el que la arriesga es un necio'
programme.desc: Una madre primeriza decide hacerle caso a su amiga y no vacunar a su hijo, pues cree que puede ser contraproducente para el bebé, sin saber que su decisión pondrá en riesgo la salud del pequeño.

programme.title: Aquí y Ahora

programme.title: Aquí y Ahora

programme.title: Aquí y Ahora
programme.desc: El bebé de Maritza Ramírez es secuestrado el día programado para nacer. En su fiesta de 16 años, los síntomas de la enfermedad de Helen reaparecen. Lumpkin, un pueblo olvidado es la ubicación de una cárcel de inmigrantes.

programme.title: Aquí y Ahora

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: Rum was so valuable in the 18th Century, that it was often preferred over money as currency. Rum was the key ingredient in the Triangle Trade that exchanged guns, gold and slaves for this precious liquid. We travel to Guyana to see how Rum is made, and to explore the legend of El Dorado, the city of gold. Chef Staib cooks traditional Guyanan dishes using local ingredients.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: Easy does it!, a delicious way to prepare a simple dish packed with flavor and panache, with easy to follow step by step instructions and plating directions. An old school recipe made simple for today's busy home chefs.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.sub-title: Pork Chops and Pineapple Upside-down Cake

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.sub-title: Black Cod with Mango and Ginger Sauce and Sautéed Green Beans
programme.desc: Chef Stellino shares his sauce making secrets, to inspire the viewers with this elegant and sophisticated Mango and Ginger sauce that is easy to make and tastes delicious! programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: Chef Stellino reconnects with his Italian roots as he guides the viewer through some simple and exciting techniques on how to make traditional Italian pasta dishes with the elegance and panache of an Italian born chef, with a plateful of tips, techniques and ideas to help anyone improve their style and performance in the kitchen.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: A soup can be a form of art! Chef Stellino shares his secrets for the perfect soups, smooth , luscious and elegant. Plus he shows the viewers a series of simple techniques to create elegant topping to dress it all up. Simple clear instructions with step by step demonstrations on how to get it done in one try!

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati visits Culiacán, the capital of Sinaloa. Founded in 1531, Culiacán is the center of trade for produce, meat, and fish. Locals pride themselves on the produce cultivated from the land and nearby sea. Celebrated chef and culinary ambassador Miguel Taniyama takes Pati to the best markets, street food stands, and restaurants. In her kitchen, Pati creates recipes inspired by the experience.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.sub-title: Altata, Hidden Gem by the Sea of Cortez
programme.desc: Altata is a small coastal town with stretches of beautiful beaches. Pati meets locals and chefs as the town embarks on a journey to reinvent itself from sleepy fishing village to tourist destination. She takes a boat ride to sample fresh oysters right from the water and visits restaurants serving fresh seafood. At home, Pati prepares a seafood feast based on the bountiful waters of the Altata Bay.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati heads to Los Mochis, a coastal city in the northern region of Sinaloa that was founded by Americans in the late 1800s. After learning its unique history and getting an incredibly delicious tour of the street food, Pati returns to her kitchen to create two mouth-watering taco recipes that take her right back to those street stands in Los Mochis.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Sinaloa's premiere resort town has 13-miles of beautiful coastline and some of the best restaurants in Mexico. But Mazatlán has overcome a complicated history. Pati meets two close friends, chefs Luis Osuna and Zahie Tellez – both witnessed the evolution of Mazatlán firsthand. They each give her a personal tour of the city, and chef Luis takes Pati to his family's restaurant, Panamá.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati is in El Fuerte, one of Mexico's "Pueblos Mágicos" or magic towns. Now a quiet colonial town, El Fuerte was the most important commercial and agricultural center in northwest Mexico for over 300 years. After a walking tour and a stop at the Hotel Posada Hidalgo to try their famous cauques, a unique local shellfish, Pati creates a few lobster recipes in her kitchen.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati travels into the mountains of Sinaloa to the tiny village of Jinetes. The small population of barely 100 people live on whatever the land gives them. Miles and miles removed from civilization, they've managed to preserve their customs and recipes for generations. Pati is the first visitor to come learn from their culinary traditions and they've prepared a feast fit for the occasion.

programme.title: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with a catering van filled with food. And finally, Froy, Lyndah, and Matt wind up in the middle of a gang dispute when they try to repo a tricked out lowrider on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: Smart and Stupids
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo a vehicle in a bad part of town and somebody gets punched in the face. Then, Sonia and Lyndah interrupt a tennis match to retrieve an automobile. Plus, Matt and Froy confront an out-of-control director in the middle of a shoot.

programme.title: Repo Basher vs. Matt
programme.desc: Matt, Froy, and Lou get a tip on a car whose owner has a boyfriend known for taking his fists to repossessors. Then, Lou and Matt derail an international expedition when they haul off with a tourist bus. And, Sonia and Froy bring some unwanted heat to a promotion for an energy drink by trying to repo the marketing truck.

programme.title: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate diner and his befuddled date.

programme.title: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: First, Lou and Matt confront a big-time player and his bodyguards at a Brazilian restaurant. Then, Sonia and Lyndah head to a yard sale to get a vehicle away from the car's owner and her out-of-control friend. And finally, the whole team hits the beach in an effort to get a truck-load of ATV's away from a gang of knife-wielding beach bums.

programme.title: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess one of their vehicles Then, And finally, after the tow truck breaks down on the side of the road, Lou, Matt, and Froy are left with no options and stuck in the middle of a violent dispute between some gun-wielding neighbors.

programme.title: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again. Then, Sonia, Matt, and Lyndah go undercover as college students to extract an extremely expensive bicycle from an extremely irate athlete. And finally, Lou and Froy head to church to repossess a van from a minister with a terrible problem.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped into their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry - a high-end luxury tanning bed owned by a less-than-sympathetic German. And finally, Lou and Matt set up a high stakes sting operation to bust a shady tow-truck driver, but will their best-laid plans go up in smoke?

programme.title: The Dune Buggy
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van that is busy being loaded up with stolen electronics by a dangerous pair of criminals. And finally, Matt and Froy head to the desert to sneak an extremely rare top-of-the-line dune buggy from a crew of dedicated off-roaders.

programme.title: High and Low Spirits
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a baffling marital spat involving a man, his wife, and her untrustworthy yoga instructor. Then, Sonia and Lyndah hit the fashion district to repossess a van from a designer who's way ahead of the curve in terms of the fashion world, but way behind on her payments. And finally, Matt and Froy spoil spirits when they head to a carwash to reclaim a vehicle from a group of vicious, scantily-clad sorority girls.

programme.title: Repo Outside the Box
programme.desc: First, Matt and Sonia attempt to repossess a car from a group of cleaver-wielding short-order cooks with a taste for violence. Then, it's trouble in paradise as Matt and Froy take on the task of reclaiming a beach-scene-on-wheels filled with irate models. And finally, Sonia and Matt find themselves outmatched by a well-armed street gang and its charismatic leader.

programme.title: Horse Semen & the Rolls Royce Golf Cart
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute between a flower lady and her displeased client. programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.sub-title: Crane Cannon Launch/Trash Scavenger Hunt/Heli Body Drag
programme.desc: This episode featured four pairs as teams. First, it's the human cannonball. As a truck drives along a pier with a crane hanging off the side, one team member hangs from a crane and then into the water they light the fuse to giant cannon. Their partner is shot out of the cannon and into the water, swim to a boat and clip a flag to a flagpole. The team to finish fastest chooses team to be eliminated. Next, it's a trash can buffet scavenger hunt. Teams dig through dumpsters and barrels to find items. The team to match four items fastest would win a four-day trip to Las Vegas and $20,000. No one would be eliminated. The final stunt is a real drag. Team members hanging on to handlebars attached to a helicopter and are dragged across pavement on their stomachs. They have to let go as close to the finish line as possible. The team to get the least combined distance from the finish line would win $50K. The home invasion stunt goes to Dubuque, Iowa.

programme.desc: Before the challenge begins, the designers are asked to re-pick their teams. Then, in teams of two, the designers are tasked with making a prom dress out of duct tape. In addition to the Runway, they are also judged on their work by a group of high school students, whose votes factor into their final score. Two designers are eliminated.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Regrouping once again, the judges decide which designers they would like to see work together, and the teams are separated into two teams of four. The designers must make cohesive looks for the male dance troupe Thunder From Down Under. Not only must they execute menswear, but their designs must be able to “tear away” onstage as part of their performance.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: In new teams of twos and threes, the designers make a ready-to-wear look for Lord and Taylor, inspired by their famous rose design. The winning design is manufactured and sold at Lord and Taylor for Spring 2013.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: In pairs again, the designers use HP technology and inspiration drawn from the Guggenheim Museum to create two looks: one avant-garde and a second ready-to-wear piece. They are also able to design their fabric for this challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: After working in teams all season, the designers are relieved when they receive the news that they will now be working on their own. However, some of the eliminated designers return to act as assistants and help the competitors complete their look. For this challenge, the designers must make a Spring 2013 editorial look to be worn by actress Jordana Brewster and featured in Marie Claire.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: The remaining designers are paired with new assistants and each sent to a European fashion capital: Paris, Barcelona, London, and Berlin. One unlucky designer stays in NYC. The designers must draw inspiration from their city, as well as purchase their materials there. Upon returning to NYC, they must create a look for the judges that will prove they have what it takes to design a collection for Fashion Week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Weak and weary from their journey, the few designers left say goodbye to NYC and return to their respective hometowns to begin working on their final collections. Tim Gunn travels to visit the designers and assess their progress. In the end, all four remaining designers must present their three best pieces to the judging panel, as the judges are left to decide who will move on to show at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: It's the moment of truth for the remaining designers as they each present their final collections to an eager audience at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week. One designer is named the winner of Project Runway Season 11, and the rest are unfortunately out.
